Frog Legs - $22 Puff Pastry filled with select mushrooms, truffle oil, spinach and goat cheese on a light herb cream sauce. Mushroom Puff Pastry $14/$28 Classic preparation of a half dozen or dozen escargot out of the shell made with our persillade. Escargot - $30 Chefs' selection of artisan French cheeses served with warm baguette, cornichons and fig jam. Cheese board - - $28 Our Chefs selection of cured meats and pate' with mixed greens, cornichons, olives and Dijon. Charcuterie $20 Pears poached in port wine over a bed of baby spinach and arugula, with candied pistachios, goat cheese and topped with a fig vinaigrette and crispy shallots. Pear Salad - - $14/$20 Local Bibb lettuce with tomatoes, English cucumbers, feta, olives and champagne vinaigrette. Tomato Feta Cucumber Salad - $18 Imported Crotin cheese, local Bibb lettuce with champagne vinaigrette, fresh Pomegranate seeds and lardons. Warm Goat Cheese Salad - $20 Local Tarvin Seafood shrimp sauteed in a white wine broth with fresh herbs, lemon and local blistered heirloom tomatoes. Shrimp Provencal Entrees - $32 White wine, garlic, cream with fresh herbs, lardons and a touch of Roquefort cheese. Steamed Mussels w/ Frites - $44 Fresh Duck Breast seared to a medium rare served with roasted potatoes and Haricot Verts. *Seared Duck - $48 Cast Iron seared lamb chops with balsamic reduction served over rosemary pomme puree and Haricot Verts. Lamb Chops - $46 Twelve-ounce Prime Strip seared medium rare served with Haricot Verts and frites. *Steak Frites - $38 Slow cooked hand cut bone in Pork Chop with house made Jus over mashed potatoes and Haricot Verts. Pork Chop - $34 Harissa spiced lamb sausage, grilled and served with couscous grain and a traditional vegetable stew. Merguez $34 Pan seared fillet with brown butter and lemon sauce, served with mashed potatoes and Haricot Verts. Flounder Maison - - $38 Oven baked Alaskan Cod topped with local Tarvin Seafood Shrimp with a lemon dill butter sauce, served over cauliflower puree and Haricot Verts. Baked Alaskan Cod - $48 Maryland Style with jumbo lump crab and house made aioli, served with roasted potatoes and Haricot Verts. Double Crab Cake Dinner - $42 House pounded veal cutlets prepared in a blanquette sauce with mushrooms over mash potatoes and Haricot Verts. medical conditions. Veal Scallopini *Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain conditions.

Search Search for: Search for: Recent Posts Gutenberg Sample Post Testing the Elements Post with Tiled Gallery Image Alignment A post showing how headings looks like Recent Comments on Pavel Ciorici Nullam id dolor id nibh ultricies vehicula ut id elit on Pavel Ciorici Image Alignment on Pavel Ciorici Image Alignment on Pavel Ciorici Image Alignment on Pavel Ciorici Curabitur blandit tempus porttitor Archives September 2019 April 2016 March 2016 February 2016 May 2015 Categories Events News Restaurant Video Meta Log in Entries feed Comments feed WordPress.org VINS BLANCS Fresh and lively with spiraling bubbles, delicate bouquet, and a subtle complex flavor Pol Clement - Light and refreshing with light notes of apple on the nose. Doc Treviso Prosecco - An unoaked wine. It is mouth watering, medium bodied and refreshing with the right amount floral and peaches. Picpoul De Pinet - This White Bordeaux is a classic blend of 60% Sauvignon Blanc and 40% Semillon. It is crisp and slightly herbaceous with citrus tones and hints of grapefruit. Chateau Lamothe Bordeaux Blanc - Loire Valley Chardonnay with great fruit forwardness with plenty of minerality and has a crisp clean finish with no oak. Bernier Chardonnay - This Cotes De Provence Rose wine has pink hue with tight and ripe fruit, wine from this region has strong bouquet and delicious finish that will let you taste the coast of France. Domaine De Paris Rose - VINS ROUGES This Cabernet exhibits ripe fruit and a good body also featuring a distinctive peppery nose. Luc Cholot Cabernet Sauvignon - Generous aromas of red berry and sweet plum. Dark fruit notes with dry spices. This 100% Malbec is a smooth and round wine. Malbec Du Clos - This wine is from the Ventoux region of the Rhone Valley and is all about savory red fruits and gentle tannins. Leaving it smooth on the palate and very bright yet slightly dry. Cristia Ventoux - Primary fruit with a good structure and freshness dominate the wine style. This wine is big and ripe with smooth tannins and long finish. Chateau Roc De Segur Bordeaux - This full body red comes from the foothills of the Beaujolais mountains in Southern Burgundy, with remarkable fresh fruit notes. Chateau De Pizay Morgon - This Medoc is a blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot. Ruby in color, well rounded and balanced on the palate with notes of cassis, cherries, and firm tannins. Chateau Bourbon La Chapelle Medoc - This blend of Merlot, Cabernet, and Malbec comes from the heart of the Bordeaux region, just south of St Emilion. This Chateau Saint Sulpice is typically fragrant, soft, and well balanced. Chateau Saint Sulpice Bordeaux - RESERVE WINE LIST A sweet aperitif and or dessert wine from Sauternes in the Bordeaux region of France. Château Du Mayne Sauternes 2018 3 oz Pour - This bright wine has peach, lenon, and honey aromas. On the palate there are hints of lemon and tangerine. Crispy, tart, medium bodies and buttery. Marie Pierre Manciat Pouilly Fuisse 2018 - This wine features plenty of green apple and hints of lemon to the mineral undertones. Full bodies with a crisp texture and flavorful finish. Fournier Sancerre Grand Cuvee 2018 - This intense yet very elegant Champagne has a perfect combination of fruit, toast, and almond notes. Champagne Gatinois Grand Cru Brut Tradition - A hint of bitterness is all the peeks through on the shy nose of this wine. The palate has a creamy richness that unites a touch of smokey flint with melted butter, a hint of oak and ripe pear notes. Chanson Meursault White Burgundy 2018 - This wine has ripe black cherry, plum, earth, and stone flavors. Rich and balanced, with firm tannins and a mouthwatering finish. Louis Latour Marsannay Burgundy 2019 - This wine has a deep ruby color with a purple tinge. Its' nose shows aromas of blackberries and spices, lifted by some mineral and gently wooded notes. Sainte Epine Saint Joseph Delas Syrah 2019 - This wine is full bodies with rather robust tannins. Note the presence of ripe black fruits including blackcurrant and sometimes truffle. The bouquet is rich and complex with notes of black and red fruits. Château La Fleur Du Mayne Pomerol 2015 - This Bordeaux is a smooth medium body red with notes of cherry, blackberry, oak, and vanilla. Chateau Paveil De Luze Margaux 2018 - Bordeaux wine with great attention to fermentation and aging, making it adopt the characteristic of a powerful but elegant red wine. Charme Cos De Labory Saint Estephe 2015 - If you know, you know. Châteauneuf Du Pape Lazaret 2015 -
